title: Update event schedule to show midnight end time for both days

requirements.text: Update the Schedule/Events page to display that events run until midnight (00:00) on both Day 1 and Day 2. Modify the timeline display to show the final event slot ending at midnight for each day.
acceptanceCriteria: Day 1 schedule shows events running until midnight (00:00)
Day 2 schedule shows events running until midnight (00:00)
The midnight end time is clearly visible in the timeline display
The schedule maintains its current tournament and game lineup structure

constraints: Do not modify the day selector dropdown functionality
Preserve the existing tournament and game lineup information
Maintain the current cartoon/neon visual styling
nonGoals: Adding new tournaments or games to the schedule
Changing the schedule layout or structure
Modifying other pages beyond the Schedule/Events page
